channel.title: Item Tool Tips [317/Delta]
channel.description:
Been trying for sometime but not sure how to do this, does any one know how i can create a tool tip for items
basicly when you highlight an item i want it to give a tool tip, kinda like when you right click it you get that menu, but basicly a hovering menu.
anyone know where i could start looking for this? I've looked in the client and server but the server seems to be the wrong direction, so i'm not sure which spot to place this server help or client help, but either way i'm not sure how to add tool tips and i'm just looking for a good starting point.
317/Delta.
Edit: Or how to call an interface on mouse over would be great too.
